oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Award of Insurance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This is a preprinted form letter "Award To Beneficary" with "Frank McClellan Ring," "$10,000," "fifty-seven and 50/100 Dollars" "10th day of Oct. 1918 to the 10th day of October 1938," entered in the appropriate spaces on the form. The document also includes information about eligible beneficiaries as outlined in the War Risk Insurance Act of 1917. Pvt. Frank M. Ring, Co. A, 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. died while fighitng in France in October 1918. He was from Franklin, Williamson County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
